title: Lord Professor Robert Winston Lecture
desc: Another in our Public Lecture Programme chaired by Dr Kenneth Wolfe. Lord Winston is Professor of Science and Society and Emeritus Professor of Fertility Studies at Imperial College London. In the 1970s he developed gynaecological surgical techniques that improved fertility treatments. He later pioneered new treatments to improve in vitro fertilisation (IVF) and developed?pre-implantation diagnosis.? Robert Winston is also Chairman of the Genesis Research?Trust ? a charity which raised over ?13 million to establish the Institute of Reproductive and Developmental Biology and which now funds high quality research into women?s health and babies, he is the leading authority on everything to do with birth. Please note this event has moved from Monday 23rd November to  Tuesday 24th November .
